modName: Trinity And Kayla ELF Companions FULL HDT CBBE_UUNP_With PRESETS
summary: Adds two Elf companions to the game. With SMS (Smart Heal System). Created to be assassins recommended for higher levels. Presets included.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#f1c232]Decided to re-up Trinity being she was a total redo. Facegen was tweaked more and Kayla was added. Both use SMS (Smart Heal System) which heals you and them when you need it while still using different types of combat. Full HDT means they both have breast, butt and belly animation. They will use all three combat types, melee, ranged and magic with the exception of a test we have done they won't always use magic with a bow and sword equipped. If you have our old Trinity mod this mod will NOT affect nor overwrite anything. [/color]

[color=#f1c232]Stats:[/color]

[color=#f1c232]Location: Lost Valley Redoubt ([/color]coc[color=#f1c232] lostvalleyredoubt01) [/color]
[color=#f1c232]Health, Magicka, and Stamina: 500[/color]
[color=#f1c232]Speed: 165[/color]
[color=#f1c232]They both will use Melee and Ranged attacks more than the others.[/color]
[color=#f1c232]Marriageable [/color]
[color=#f1c232]Essential[/color]
[color=#f1c232]Height: 1.0[/color]
[color=#f1c232]Weight: 100[/color]
[color=#f1c232]Class: Spellsword[/color]
[color=#f1c232]Voice: Female Elf Haughty. [/color][color=#00ffff]Note: You will need Relationship Dialogue Overhaul for this voice type to work.[/color]
[color=#f1c232]Default Armor and Weapons: Forsworn [/color]

[color=#f1c232]Credits:[/color]

[color=#f1c232]Fair Skin Complexion [/color]
[color=#f1c232]KS Hairdo's Renewal [/color]
[color=#f1c232]Eyes Of Beauty[/color]
Brows

author: Majestic Mod Squad
